settings.title: Pavé De Genève
settings.text: The blend of slightly crunchy Hazelnuts, and tender Dark Chocolate 55%, all elegantly coated in Cocoa Powder

settings.title: Dark Caramelis
settings.text: The sweetness of the Salt Crystals in the middle of a buttery Caramel

settings.title: Dark Almond
settings.text: The balance of velvety Dark Chocolate and Praline with a crunchy Caramelised Almond

settings.title: Mocha
settings.text: The rich tannins in the 6% infusion of Coffee meld seamlessly with the essence of Dark Chocolate Coffee beans and Hazelnuts

settings.title: Dark Pistachio
settings.text: The crunch of decadent Milk Chocolate enfolded a soft Almond and Pistachio heart

settings.title: Fresh Mint
settings.text: The infusion of Swiss Cream and Dark Chocolate 54% blend with a hint of fresh Mint

settings.title: Venezuela 65% and Cocoa Nibs
settings.text: The delicious Ganache Fondant is enriched with the robustness of Caramelised Cocoa Nibs, coated in Maracaibo Chocolate 65%

settings.title: Criolait
settings.text: The exquisite blend of 38% Cocoa Milk Ganache

settings.title: Feuilletine - Milk
settings.text: The delicate crunch of puff pastry Wafers enveloped in a luscious Milk Chocolate coating, Almonds, and Hazelnuts

settings.title: Hazelnut
settings.text: The pronounced Hazelnut flavour is complemented by creamy Milk Chocolate

settings.title: Rose
settings.text: The refined allure of Rose infused into velvety Milk Chocolate

settings.title: Dark Chocolate
settings.text: The boldness and intensity of the crisp Dark Chocolate shell and a soft indulgent centre at its finest

settings.title: Milk Chocolate
settings.text: A delightful combination of a crisp Milk Chocolate shell and a soft indulgent centre awaits

settings.title: White Chocolate
settings.text: Wrapped in a veil of gentle White Chocolate and a soft captivating centre

settings.title: Milk Cervin
settings.text: The luscious harmony of a Gruyère Double Cream centre, enveloped in smooth Milk Chocolate

settings.title: Helvet
settings.text: The rich symphony of velvety Milk Chocolate and Hazelnuts

settings.title: Puffed Rice
settings.text: The exquisite blend of Hazelnuts, Almonds, and Caramelised Puffed Rice

settings.title: Almond
settings.text: The decadence of rich Almonds and smooth Milk Chocolate

settings.title: Almond White Chocolate
settings.text: The richness of Almonds, embraced by a blend of creamy White Chocolate

settings.title: Sesame Hazelnut Milk Chocolate Square
settings.text: The nutty lavishness of Hazelnuts intertwined with creamy Milk Chocolate, accentuated by a hint of Sesame Seeds

settings.title: Caramel Yuzu White Chocolate Square
settings.text: The exotic blend of Caramelised Yuzu enveloped in rich White Chocolate

settings.title: Sansho Pepper Black Chocolate Square
settings.text: The harmonious blend of Almonds, Sansho Peppers, coated in a perfectly balanced bitter and sweet Dark Chocolate

settings.title: White Caramel Lemon Truffle
settings.text: The tangy sweetness of Caramelised Lemon coated in creamy White Chocolate
